allow: Bash("/c/Program Files/R/R-4.4.0/bin/Rscript.exe" -e "setwd\(''C:/Users/robin/fireData''\); Sys.setenv\(RSTUDIO_PANDOC=''C:/Program Files/RStudio/resources/app/bin/quarto/bin/tools''\); pkg <- devtools::build\(\); cat\(''\\nPackage built:'', pkg, ''\\n''\)")

Bash("/c/Program Files/R/R-4.4.0/bin/Rscript.exe" -e "
setwd\(''C:/Users/robin/fireData''\)
Sys.setenv\(RSTUDIO_PANDOC=''C:/Program Files/RStudio/resources/app/bin/quarto/bin/tools''\)

# Build the package first
pkg_path <- devtools::build\(\)
cat\(''Package built at:'', pkg_path, ''\\n''\)

# Get package info
desc <- read.dcf\(''DESCRIPTION''\)
pkg_name <- desc[1, ''Package'']
pkg_version <- desc[1, ''Version'']
maintainer <- desc[1, ''Maintainer'']

cat\(''\\n=== CRAN Submission Info ===\\n''\)
cat\(''Package:'', pkg_name, ''\\n''\)
cat\(''Version:'', pkg_version, ''\\n''\)
cat\(''Maintainer:'', maintainer, ''\\n''\)
cat\(''Tarball:'', pkg_path, ''\\n''\)
cat\(''\\nTo submit manually, go to:\\n''\)
cat\(''https://cran.r-project.org/submit.html\\n''\)
cat\(''\\nAnd upload:'', pkg_path, ''\\n''\)
")
